original_text: Judah's people have turned against God. As a result, people have done disgusting things in Jerusalem and in all Israel. You have spoiled the holy place, the temple that the Lord loves. You have turned away from the Lord and you worship foreign gods.
korean_text: 유다는 거짓을 행하였고 이스라엘과 예루살렘 중에서는 가증한 일을 행하였으며 유다는 여호와께서 사랑하시는 그 성결을 욕되게 하여 이방 신의 딸과 결혼하였으니

sentences.original_text: Judah's people have turned against God.
As a result, people have done disgusting things
sentences.korean_translation: 그 결과, 사람들이 역겨운 일을 저질렀습니다.

sentences.original_text: in Jerusalem and in all Israel.
You have spoiled the holy place,
the temple that the Lord loves.
You have turned away from the Lord
